Flying
[i]Loyal Retainer[/i] –Whenever Melady, Crimson Rider attacks, up to one target Noble you control gains indestructible until end of turn.
[i]Search for Guinevere[/i] – At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a card from among them. If you reveal a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped. If you reveal a creature card, put it into your hand. Put each other card on the bottom of your library in any order.
